attributes.action: Dagenham and Redbridge to always play in yellow
attributes.additional_details:
Proposal: Mandating Dagenham & Redbridge F.C. to Always Play in Yellow

Dagenham & Redbridge F.C. consistently perform better when wearing their yellow kit, with key victories and improved results linked to its use. Yellow boosts energy and confidence, giving players a psychological edge. Fans associate it with success, strengthening their connection to the club. As a symbol of community pride and resilience, mandating the yellow kit would enhance performance, foster unity, and uphold a winning tradition that benefits both the team and its supporters.
attributes.background: Pass a law to make in law that Dagenham and Redbridge always play in yellow
